reviews.review_msg: Elspeth was open and respectful of my ideas, and also gave an honest reactions - probably only one of two profs who have ever used feedback to build on my projects rather than drastically change them Also avoid being aggressively pretentious - ie talk a lot but only got a whole lot of nothing

AMAZING, CREATIVE, ALWAYS ACTIVE WITH STUDENTS AND ART PRACTICE, MOTIVATING, CARING, UNDENIABLY PASSIONATE, EXCELLENT, INFORMATIVE, GOES OUT OF HER WAY TO HELP YOU OUT, SYMPATHETIC AND ENCOURAGING, I LOVE JIN-ME, SHE PARTIES LIKE A ROCKSTAR!
